name: Shadow of the Demon Lord
description: This is the start of taking the current Shadow of the Demon Lord character sheet to the next level, since the core Game Mechanics requirements exceed what can be done with macros.

useroptions.name: variable1
useroptions.description: This is the first user option. Options will appear in the order they are placed inside the useroptions hash on their API page. This option is a text input that will accept any string.

useroptions.name: variable2
useroptions.description: The second user option is a number input and will only accept valid numbers.

useroptions.name: selectoption
useroptions.description: The third user option is a select, with both set options and a default option.

useroptions.name: variable3
useroptions.description: The fourth user option is a checkbox with a value for the checked box as well as whether or not the box is checked by default.
